channel.title: CVE Feed for Xylus Themes -- all
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Xylus Themes -- all products

item.title: CVE-2024-47352|2024-10-07T13:14:02.157Z -- xylus%20themes -- wp%20bulk%20delete
item.description: Improper Neutralization of Input During Web Page Generation (XSS or 'Cross-site Scripting') vulnerability in Xylus Themes WP Bulk Delete allows Reflected XSS.This issue affects WP Bulk Delete: from n/a through 1.3.1.
